data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Carlow. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Carlow, Ireland
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Carlow.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Carlow.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Carlow, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Carlow.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Carlow to agree with you and with one another.
Father, comfort those who mourn in Carlow, Ireland.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.
